item.title: Hieu Trung Le
item.author: hieuletrung102@gmail.com (Hieu Le)
item.description: KBTG, Thailand ☎️ +66910107582 (Thailand) ☎️ +84982051922 (Vietnam) ✉️ hieuletrung102@gmail.com Love to work with the cutting edge, excited to learn, a creative problem solver, resourceful in getting things done and productive working independently or collaboratively. My top 5 talents from CliftonStrengths result are Learner, Input, Connectedness, Responsibility, Maximizer. -- Working experience KBTG, Bangkok, Thailand, 10.2018 - current Software Developer Develop Node.js back-end powered by Express.js for client app. Develop front-end web for operational management with React.
